# External Tools

This directory contains external tools and libraries used by ProtoVM.

## High-Level Assembler 3 (HLA3)

HLA3 is used for creating custom assemblers, including the 4004 assembler for ProtoVM.

- Original source: https://www.plantation-productions.com/Webster/HighLevelAsm/hla3/hla3.zip
- Version: [To be filled in when downloaded]
- Used for creating 4004 assembler in ProtoVM
